title: ISic004401. I.Sicily inscription 004401
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]cd[---]a [te]mporibus
[---]o in Dom(ino) cd [---po]ntificis patris episoc(opi)
[---]xitus su[---]io[..D]ominus do
[---]en[---h]onoris se
5[---sancte ecclesie ca]tolice

Apparatus criticus

Text of Rizzone; Rizzone suggests alternatively: [sancte fidei ca]tolice

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • Pace 1916 702 no.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001694
  • Bilotta 1977 34-36 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002151
  • 58.1028 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • Salinas NSA 1893 341 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392
  • Rizzone 2011 81 A13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001631
